fields_of_interest: Budget, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Youth, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Research and Innovation Policy, Regional Policy, Environmental Policy, Industrial Policy, Internal Market, Multiannual Financial Framework
membership:
The National Union of Employers (NUE): http://www.ruzsr.sk/about-us  
 
Investment Support Association (ISA): http://isa-association.sk/en/
goals__remit: EOS Innovazioni a.s. helps its clients to grow by providing consultancy services in the area of public funding for financing of their projects, in particular in energy, environment, research, development and innovation and transport sector. EOS Innovazioni a.s. advises clients on preparing project proposals, budget planning, project management and implementation. Our services further cover EU policy monitoring, intelligence gathering and dialogue with stakeholders.
relevant_communication: Participation in public hearings, consultations, seminars, workshops, conferences in order to obtain information and important knowledge about EU policies in these areas and to develop our network with experts familiar in these sectors.
customers: Ministry of Health of the Slovak Republic# ŽOS Trnava, a. s.
